1.title: StartCoding.org
1.description: A place to discover and share coding resources. Built with React and MongoDB. We ditched the flux pattern in favor of a lighter custom-built store/event emitter. DIY react router. Recursive comment components. Lots of fun!

2.title: Green It Forums
2.description: A Reddit-inspired forum app that allows users to post content, comment, and vote. Viewed links turn green! The frontend is written with React, and the backend uses Node.js/Express, and MongoDB

3.title: Tower of Hanoi
3.description: The classic Tower of Hanoi game. Written using jQuery.
